attributes.action: CHANGE THE TAX BANDS TO A MORE FAIRER SYSTEM
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
from april the 10p tax rate will be abolished, and the 22p dropped to 20p, leaving everyone under the 40p bracket paying at 20p. It would be alot fairer to charge 10p on the first £10'000,
20p up to £20'000,
30p up to £30'000,
40p up to £40'000
and 50p on the rest.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
